author: breser
msg: Merge the r1488294 group from trunk:
Add signal information to external program errors.
Makes it easier to diagnose failures.

author: hdu
msg: #i122378# fix the dbgutil-enabled build on Windows
crt-debug libraries use different structure layouts than their
regular counterparts so mixing causes binary incompatibilities
which must be avoided. Always using the regular libs achieves this.
